name: CBGroupIdentity
desc: An object of the CBGroupIdentity class represents a group identity and is used for viewing the attributes of group identities from an identity authority. The principal attributes of a CBGroupIdentity object are a POSIX group identifier (GID) and a list of members.

items.name: init?(posixGID: gid_t, authority: CBIdentityAuthority)
items.desc: Returns the group identity with the given POSIX GID in the specified identity authority.

items.name: var posixGID: gid_t
items.desc: Returns the POSIX GID of the identity.
